title: Radio Replay: Life, Interrupted
description: What price do we pay for the constant interruptions we get from our phones and computers? And is there a better way to handle distraction? In this week's Radio Replay we bring you a favorite conversation with the computer scientist Cal Newport. Plus, Shankar gets electrodes strapped to his head to test a high-tech solution to interruptions.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
